remarks: Sets of words are disjoint if each set contains extensions of distinct words of a fixed length.  (Contributed by AV, 29-Jul-2018.)  (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro/AV, 20-Oct-2018.)
statement:
disjxwrd $p |- Disj_ y e. W { x e. Word V | ( x substr <. 0 , N >. ) = y } $.
$d N x y $.
$d V x $.
